markdown.markdown:
I am a Lecturer in Statistics at the [School of Mathematics](https://www.maths.ed.ac.uk/school-of-mathematics/people/a-z?person=1035), at the University of Edinburgh, and a part-time remote lecturer at Istinye University. In November 2023, I got the fellowship accreditation of Higher Education Academics in UK (FHEA). Previously, I held two postdoc positions at Padova University (2021) and KU Leuven (2020), after completing my PhD at Middle East Technical University in 2018. Outside of university teaching, I was a **co-organiser** of Technology Enhanced Mathematical Sciences Education (TEMSE) seminars in School of Math for 2023-2025, nowadays having the roles of Academic Cohort Lead (ACL), Generative AI TEMSE co-lead, **EdinbR community** and **RSS Edinburgh** local group member. In addition to my official teaching and research duties, I have been interested in giving online training courses since COVID pandemic. These efforts turned to be a permanent habit and I shared my experiences with interested people.

I'm looking to collaborate on copulas and its applications, statistical methods for insurance and environment. I have a certain level of R skills and novice learner for Python programming. I am ambitious about improving my statistical learning skills by leading/organizing/being a part of training workshops. Recently, I am interested in Gen-AI tools and their impacts on teaching and learning.

------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Main Research Interests {.test}

- Copulas and Its Applications, - Mixture of Vine Copulas, - Drought Studies, - Statistical Methods in Finance and Insurance, - Parameter Estimation and Model Selection - Generative AI applications - Statistical Education

------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Education {.test}

- PhD in Statistics, Middle East Technical University (Turkey), 2012-2018 - MSc in Actuarial Science, Middle East Technical University (Turkey), 2009-2012 - BSc in Mathematics, Middle East Technical University (Turkey), 2004-09
